Polish embassy officials visit Pyongyang Embroidery Institute
articles.content:
Polish embassy officials visit Pyongyang Embroidery Institute 
    Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- The charge d'affaires and other officials of the Polish embassy here visited the Pyongyang Embroidery Institute on Wednesday on the occasion of the National Day of Poland.
 The visitors went round several embroidery rooms of the institute, being briefed on the positive efforts made by its employees for the Korean embroidery development.    
 On the same day, they toured the recreation ground in Mt. Jongbang.
